description:
==============================================================

EXTREMELY USEFUL TO UNDERSTAND THE ADVANCE SQL 11g CONCEPTS

===============================================================

At the end of this course, you will get the knowledge of...

How to write SQL queries to access data stored in an Oracle Database schema. Learn to manipulate data and use various types of functions for customizing data output.

You will learn Oracle SQL 11g advance concepts like General functions,Views,Database Objects,Controlling User Access, Set Operators, Adv Date Time Functions,Group By Clause, Sub-queries, Hierarchical Retrieval,Oracle Extensions to DML and DDL Statements
title: Oracle SQL 11g - Advance
